description: Semi-transparent overlay color for modal dialogs, drawers, and other components that require dimming the underlying content

Fill color for secondary elements where a custom hue is needed. Use for user-generated categories, tags, or chips where semantic color meaning isn't predefined. Override number.hue.category on the element to set the hue while maintaining accessibility through consistent lightness and saturation with color.foreground.secondary.
